title: I can't Que up ON my Dell Inspirion mini
body: I have been trying to figure out. How do i hit the que up botton. my screen is so small and its not letting me hit it. Help me plz.

replies.body:
I'm not sure I understand the issue, but it sounds like you might have a low resolution.  As a quick try, you can mouse your cursor to the corner of the client to make it smaller.  You may also need to configure your scaling, which is a recent workaround due to some recent windows updates that's caused a similar issue:

Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

I hope that helps!
